LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Grenadier.label: Grenadier
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Grenadier.description:
A biped humanoid-imitated robot design to form as another mechanoid combat unit, it can equipped with the standard weapons that humans can use.
These models carry a battery backpack with a long-lasting battery lifespans, but makes it unable to fight effectively without cover as the battery backpack is a vulnerable point.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Grenadier.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Grenadier.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.label: Kanonier

A biped humanoid-imitated robot design to form as another mechanoid combat unit, it can equipped with standard weapons that humans can use.
These models carry a battery backpack with a long-lasting battery lifespans, but makes it unable to fight effectively without cover as the battery backpack is a vulnerable point.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Kanonier.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.label: sergeant
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.description: As a relay command variant of a mech soldat, it has a very recognizable disc-shaped omnidirectional radar and transceiver antenna. it can be the mechnitor command relay but due to its weight with reduced fire control system, which can only equip a light weapon for self defense.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Sergeant.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.label: soldat
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.description:
A biped humanoid robot imitated design from the combat unit of mechanoids, can equipped with weapons that humans can use.
Although the carried battery backpack having a long battery life, but is also makes it unable to fight like a genuine mech walkers without cover.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Soldat.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
